Correction
Correction to: Dementia and Sexuality: A  Story of Continued Renegotiation
This is a correction to: Frauke Claes, MSc, Paul Enzlin, PhD, Dementia and Sexuality: A  Story of Continued Renegotiation, The Gerontologist, 2022, gnac127, https:// doi.org/10.1093/geront/gnac127.
In the originally published version of this manuscript, author Frauke Claes’ name was incorrectly listed as “Claes Frauke”.
This error has now been corrected.
D ow nloaded from https://academ ic.oup.com /gerontologist/article/63/2/399/6910526 by Indian Institute of Technology Patna user on 17 January 2024

title: Correction to: Dementia and Sexuality: A  Story of Continued Renegotiation
